ABOUT US

Newark AI Town Hall is a community initiative dedicated to making artificial intelligence accessible and understandable for everyone in Newark, regardless of their technical background or experience.

We believe that literacy shouldn't be reserved for tech professionals. As AI becomes increasingly present in our daily lives‚Äîfrom job applications to healthcare to education‚Äîevery member of our community deserves to understand how it works and how it affects them.

Founded by Newark residents who care deeply about bringing the digital divide, we're creating a welcoming space where neighbors can learn together, ask questions freely, and explore AI's opportunities and challenges in a judgment-free environment.

üë•

COMMUNITY-LED

Run by Newark residents, for Newark residents. We understand our community's unique needs and challenges.

üìö

ACCESSIBLE LEARNING

No jargon, no prerequisites, no judgment. Just clear, friendly explanations in plain language.

üéÅ

ALWAYS FREE

Education is a right, not a privilege. All our events, resources, and support are 100% free.
